lead_paragraph: The Antiques column in Weekend on Friday, about White House decor, misstated the given name of the first Union officer killed in the Civil War, whose body lay in state in the East Room. He was Elmer Ellsworth, not Ephraim.
abstract: Correction of December 29 Antiques column about White House decor
snippet: The Antiques column in Weekend on Friday, about White House decor, misstated the given name of the first Union officer killed in the Civil War, whose body lay in state in the East Room. He was Elmer Ellsworth, not Ephraim....
